name: Kodable Education
headline: Kodable Education teaches kids how to code before they can read.
description:
Kodable Education was founded to fill a gap in education currently affecting over 250 million kids around the world.  Our mission is to help prepare kids for success in the 21st century by making programming education accessible to everyone.

We make awesome games that not only teach kids about programming, but help develop soft skills like grit, perseverance, and problem solving. Kids journey through the Smeeborgian Universe with a family of furry aliens and learn about programming logic, JavaScript, and game design. Kodable also includes a curriculum for elementary school teachers so they can feel confident teaching along side the game. 

Kodable is already used in over 50% of US schools, and in over 190 countries. Help us continue our mission and expose millions more kids to the wonderful world of computer science!

founders.name: Grechen Schumacher
founders.description: I'm great at understanding users, early product design, and I enjoy solving problems for people. I'm currently interested in solving problems for women, families, small businesses, and the environment.

raw_markdown="Code Your Own Game In Our New Hour of Code Activity!
[PLay Now](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/www.kodable.com/hour-of-code/creator-high-flyer>)
[![Kodable Education](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cce30e829910a6cbb54145_kodable-education-logo.svg)](https://www.kodable.com/</>)
[![Kodable Education](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cce30e829910a6cbb54145_kodable-education-logo.svg)](https://www.kodable.com/</>)

For Educators

[Log In](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/game.kodable.com>)
[Log In](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/game.kodable.com>)
[![Download on the App Store](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce0e9d4795d725985007d3_mobile-nav-download-app-store-button.svg)](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/kodable/id577673067>)
[Register](https://www.kodable.com/</register>)
# Kodable can help any kid learn to code
Our suite of engaging learning games empower children to develop essential skills to prepare them for their digital future. 
[Start Coding Today](https://www.kodable.com/</register>)
![Child and mother playing Kodable on iPad](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65d365108c74989d431d1d39_hero-home.webp)
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb6ffff11dc94cfd28f41b_icon-arrow-down.svg)](https://www.kodable.com/<#home-section-1>)
## Games to help explore STEM through code
![Kodable game screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce29a80da3e9530b835e64_kodable-basics-main.webp)
![Kodable Basics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65c0e368e3e5061126fd31fe_kodable-basics-logo.svg)
Grades K+
![Kodable game screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cf5eac2a0b66e87e19e618_kodable-creator-main.webp)
![Kodable Creator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65c0e3680489cca094c990d2_kodable-creator-logo.svg)
Grades 3+
![Kodable game screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce29c6eb3bd3d55a8e5076_kodable-bug-world-main.webp)
![Bug World by Kodable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65c0e3682fa7c492cc2b083b_kodable-bug-world-logo.svg)
Grades K+
[Learn More About Our Apps](https://www.kodable.com/</apps>)
## Building a foundation for your child's future
Kids get to explore the world of STEM by learning core programming concepts through engaging games developed with real teachers and kids. Kodable is trusted by educators, and it can be used both in school and at home.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb7beb7d690e5ca7245560_arrow-sketch-top.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb7b6c31369c475d800640_icon-person-puzzle.svg)
### Play to Learn
Play-based learning allows students’ creativity and problem solving skills to grow.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce2f7e4674648fd777fb95_arrow-sketch-down-left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb7c433c4fd58b3972f2c9_arrow-sketch-bottom.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb7b6c98c362188f28cfe9_icon-person-lightbulb.svg)
### Learn to Code
Our Kid Optimized Developer Environment (KODE) helps students read, write, and understand real code.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce2f7ea3e38eb471ffaaa4_arrow-sketch-down-right.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cb7b6c3c4fd58b397252bb_icon-person-rocket.svg)
### Code to Create
Students use their new coding skills to create characters, defeat slimes, and even code their own games.
![Kids learning coding on computer with Kodable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce2c37735065257ab2df55_home-all-in-one-coding2.webp)
## An all-in-one STEM suite for the classroom
Teachers everywhere love how easy Kodable Basics makes it to get kids excited about exploring STEM through code. Now Kodable Creator uses that same accessible approach, with the help of a bilingual coding tutor, to enable actual creation and coding – creating a seamless path for continued growth and exploration.
[Kodable for Schools](https://www.kodable.com/</plans>)
![Kids enjoying Kodable game](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65ce2c479e0b851c9b3bb6fd_home-love-for-coding2.webp)
## A love for coding that kids can bring home
Kodable makes it easy for your child to develop fundamental coding skills, grow confident in their problem solving, and experience the joy of real coding and creation. Our fun, age-specific lessons and games encourage kids to grow at their own pace, guided by their own curiosity.
[Kodable for Parents](https://www.kodable.com/</parents>)
## Loved by kids. Even more loved by educators.
Kodable is used by millions of kids all around the world. Check out some of the fun ways people are using Kodable today!
[Learn More](https://www.kodable.com/</benefits>)
![Kodable testimonial](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/65cf755c502eaa5c4df6fc30_twitter-testimonial.webp)
## Trusted by experts
[![A Great way to introduce the concepts of programming - Edutopia](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/62fe444087e769a50dcfab77_edutopia.webp)](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/www.edutopia.org/blog/15-ways-teaching-students-coding-vicki-davis>)[![4 out of 4 stars - USA Today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/62fe444058e8b0c2a5bca77d_usa-today.webp)](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/www.usatoday.com/story/tech/columnist/gudmundsen/2015/09/27/how-get-kids-start-coding/72736670>)[![The Best Toys That Teach Kids How to Code - The New York Times](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/62fe443fe368b63dedb9596e_new-york-times.webp)](https://www.kodable.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2017/12/19/smarter-living/kids-toys-for-coding.html>)
## Building worlds for a better future
Kodable Education offers kids K-5 the opportunity to dive into an interactive world filled with colorful characters that sets them on a path to greater success. Kids love how fun it is. You’ll love watching them excel and become confident creators.
[Start a 7-Day Free Trial](https://www.kodable.com/</register>)
[![Kodable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f10984b7ece0cd68b339a1/6307940bccf34fecbbf0a98b_Kodable%20Icon.svg)](https://www.kodable.com/</>)
Educators

generated_description:
**Kodable Education Overview**

Founded in 2013 and based in San Diego, California, Kodable Education is on a mission to fill the significant gap in coding education for kids globally—currently impacting over 250 million children. Their mantra? Teach kids to code before they can read. This pitch isn't just noble; it's practical. In an increasingly tech-driven world, early exposure to programming equips children with essential skills to thrive in the 21st century.

**What They Do:**

Kodable crafts engaging educational games designed for children, leveraging an interactive universe populated by quirky extraterrestrials called Smeeborgs. Through play, kids learn coding fundamentals, problem-solving techniques, and important soft skills like grit and perseverance. The platform embraces concepts ranging from programming logic to JavaScript and game design—all wrapped in a fun package that's used in over 50% of schools across the U.S. and in more than 190 countries.

For educators, Kodable offers a comprehensive curriculum that empowers teachers with the resources they need to facilitate coding education alongside these games. This level of integration makes it a favorite among both students and teachers.

**Current Endeavors:**
Kodable is actively promoting their “Hour of Code” activities, providing opportunities for kids to create and code their own games. The games cater to various grades, starting from kindergarten (K+) all the way up to grade three (3+), showcasing that coding and play can go hand in hand.

**Why It Matters:**
Kodable believes that the future will be shaped by those who can code. By making this complex field approachable and fun for the youngest learners, they're not just teaching kids to code—they're fostering a generation of problem solvers and creative thinkers.

With a team of 17 and the backing of Y Combinator's IK12 batch, Kodable is positioned as a key player in educational technology, championing coding as a fundamental skill for kids worldwide. 

For more information, check out their website: [Kodable](https://www.kodable.com).
